title: Team Pix (recruiting Gold V - Plat I)
body: Looking to recruit people for Support, Jungle and Top. Looking to play meta picks and play late night (11pm NSW time onwards). Add me in-game or message here if interested.

replies.body: We have found five members. Feel free to add me about subbing in and such.
im a top main, add me in game, ill have more availability when i move next weekend

Plat 1 for past 3 seasons, I play a fair amount of sup, top and jg with a wide champ pool. Use Skype/Discord and am used to shotcalling.
Hit me up if you're interested! (added in client already)
